title: Team Aftermind  | LF Diamond 1+ ADC, Top and JG
body:
Hey League Community,
Due to some management changes and real life commitments with our former players and manager, i came into ownership to help rebuild what was left of the team.


The team history is quite new but used to hold many well known players. the teams is currently seated with 75 points in OOL and are prepared to aim for OCS and into OPL.


If interested here are the basic requirements needed to apply.
-Aleast Diamond  1+ (sorry unless you have a reason why you should be picked, anything lower will not be accepted)
-Can Speak English and is understandable
-Can commit time to Scrims, Tournaments and other team events
-Dedicated and is opened-minded to feedback 
-MUST be NOT toxic

If interested if fill this form out and we'll get back to you
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1SPf8AEJ3t8cWqrM71W4ExDu_n4cvFWbu03VdO_On6rk/viewform


Cheers, Mick

http://teamaftermind.com
https://twitter.com/AftermindGG
https://www.facebook.com/AftermindGG
